column4: put %06d to get a integer on 6 digit where the missing digits are filled with 0s. 1 becomes 001 and 115 becomes 115
First column: cropping in time; second column: cropping along x-axis (a value of 2048 means no cropping)
Time point the data set will be registered to
Use this option if some time points are not available (e.g. missing data)
Ratio of voxel size in X and Y to Z
Keyword for method by G. Malandain: blockmatching; keyword for phase correlation of XY/XZ/YZ projections (from scikit image): phase_correlation
column5: XZ and YZ projections (from scikit image)

column4: yes if you want to compute/recompute the transformations
yes if you also want to apply the transformations to their respective images
Set to -1 if all time points should be processed
file this line if the blockmatching binaries are not in your PATH
